name: Ultra Giga Ball Brawler
description:
They are always coming closer, smack'em with your mighty bat and watch'em roll, welcome to Ultra Giga Ball Brawler!
Now with upgrades!

Controls: Move with WASD/Left Stick, Attack with Spacebar/FaceButton

Created in 72 hours for the Lost Cartridge Game Jam 2022 by:

Alessio Giustarini - Code

Dan-Manuel Marian - Art

Alessio Luigi Dastoli - Sound and Music

(All contributed to Game Design)

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P
